Initial commit: Cloud CLI Access (CCA) framework

Complete implementation of secure, self-service CLI authentication framework using AWS IAM Identity Center.

Features:

- CCC CLI tool for browser-based OAuth authentication
- Lambda-based registration and approval handler
- S3-hosted registration form
- Comprehensive documentation and guides
- Minimal infrastructure (3 AWS services)

Infrastructure deployed:
- IAM Identity Center permission set and group
- Lambda function with Function URL
- S3 bucket for static website hosting
- SES verified email identity
